org.beanizer.j2me.charts
Class ChartItem

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Item
      javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem
          org.beanizer.j2me.charts.ChartItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
HBarChart, LineChart, PieChart, VBarChart
public abstract class ChartItem
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

The abstract ancestor class of all charts. Chart items must implement the paint() method.

popElement

public void popElement()
Pops the first element of the data serie. A popElement() followed by an addElement() and a refresh() can be used to have a dynamic shifting chart
